SUEWS_Water.txt
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

SUEWS_Water.txt specifies the characteristics for the water surface
cover type by linking codes in column 1 of SUEWS_Water.txt to the codes
specified in SUEWS_SiteSelect.txt (Code_Water).

+-----+-----+--------------+---------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------+---+
| No. | Use | Column       | Example | Descripti                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     | name         |         | on                                                                                                                       |           |   |
+=====+=====+==============+=========+==========================================================================================================================+===========+===+
| 1   | L   | Code         | 331     | Code                                                                                                                     | SUEWS_Sit |   |
|     |     |              |         | linking                                                                                                                  | eSelect.t |   |
|     |     |              |         | to                                                                                                                       | xt]]      |   |
|     |     |              |         | [[#SUEWS_                                                                                                                | for water |   |
|     |     |              |         | SiteSelec                                                                                                                | surfaces  |   |
|     |     |              |         | t.txt                                                                                                                    | (Code_Wat |   |
|     |     |              |         |                                                                                                                          | er).      |   |
|     |     |              |         |                                                                                                                          | Value of  |   |
|     |     |              |         |                                                                                                                          | integer   |   |
|     |     |              |         |                                                                                                                          | is        |   |
|     |     |              |         |                                                                                                                          | arbitrary |   |
|     |     |              |         |                                                                                                                          | but must  |   |
|     |     |              |         |                                                                                                                          | match     |   |
|     |     |              |         |                                                                                                                          | code      |   |
|     |     |              |         |                                                                                                                          | specified |   |
|     |     |              |         |                                                                                                                          | in        |   |
|     |     |              |         |                                                                                                                          | SUEWS_Sit |   |
|     |     |              |         |                                                                                                                          | eSelect.t |   |
|     |     |              |         |                                                                                                                          | xt.       |   |
+-----+-----+--------------+---------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------+---+
| 2   | MU  | AlbedoMin    | 0-1     | Minimum                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | albedo of                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | this                                                                                                                     |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | surface                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | [-]                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | -  View                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | factor                                                                                                                   |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | s                                                                                                                        |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | should                                                                                                                   |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | be                                                                                                                       |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | taken                                                                                                                    |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | into                                                                                                                     |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | accoun                                                                                                                   |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | t.                                                                                                                       |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | -  Not                                                                                                                   |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | curren                                                                                                                   |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | tly                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | used                                                                                                                     |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | for                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | water                                                                                                                    |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | surfac                                                                                                                   |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | e                                                                                                                        |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | - set                                                                                                                    |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | same                                                                                                                     |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | as                                                                                                                       |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | Albedo                                                                                                                   |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | Max.                                                                                                                     |           |   |
+-----+-----+--------------+---------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------+---+
| 3   | MU  | AlbedoMax    | 0-1     | Albedo of                                                                                                                | E         | W |
|     |     |              |         | this                                                                                                                     | x         | a |
|     |     |              |         | surface                                                                                                                  | a         | t |
|     |     |              |         | [-]                                                                                                                      | m         | e |
|     |     |              |         | -  Effect                                                                                                                | p         | r |
|     |     |              |         | ive                                                                                                                      | l         |   |
|     |     |              |         | albedo                                                                                                                   | e         |   |
|     |     |              |         | of the                                                                                                                   | v         |   |
|     |     |              |         | water                                                                                                                    | a         |   |
|     |     |              |         | surfac                                                                                                                   | l         |   |
|     |     |              |         | e.                                                                                                                       | u         |   |
|     |     |              |         | -  View                                                                                                                  | e         |   |
|     |     |              |         | factor                                                                                                                   | s         |   |
|     |     |              |         | s                                                                                                                        | [         |   |
|     |     |              |         | should                                                                                                                   | -         |   |
|     |     |              |         | be                                                                                                                       | ]         |   |
|     |     |              |         | taken                                                                                                                    | 0         |   |
|     |     |              |         | into                                                                                                                     | .         |   |
|     |     |              |         | accoun                                                                                                                   | 1         |   |
|     |     |              |         | t.                                                                                                                       |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | +---+---+                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | ---+                                                                                                                     |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | +===+                                                                                                                    |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | O                                                                                                                        |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | k                                                                                                                        |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | e                                                                                                                        |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | (                                                                                                                        |           |   |

|     |     |              |         | 8                                                                                                                        |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | 7                                                                                                                        |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | )                                                                                                                        |           |   |

|     |     |              |         | 3                                                                                                                        |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | 7                                                                                                                        |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | 8                                                                                                                        |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | ]                                                                                                                        |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | _                                                                                                                        |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | +---+---+                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | ---+                                                                                                                     |           |   |

| 4   | MU  | Emissivit    | 0-1     | Emissivit                                                                                                                | E         | W |
|     |     | y            |         | y                                                                                                                        | x         | a |
|     |     |              |         | of this                                                                                                                  | a         | t |

| 8   | MU  | StateLimi    |         | Upper                                                                                                                    |           |   |

|     |     |              |         | 20000                                                                                                                    |           |   |

|     |     |              |         | water                                                                                                                    |           |   |

|     |     |              |         | bodies                                                                                                                   |           |   |

| 9   | MU  | WaterDept    |         | Typical                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     | h            |         | depth for                                                                                                                |           |   |

|     |     |              |         | value                                                                                                                    |           |   |

|     |     |              |         | 20 m)                                                                                                                    |           |   |

|     |     |              |         | is                                                                                                                       |           |   |

|     |     |              |         | 10 mm)                                                                                                                   |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | if                                                                                                                       |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | water                                                                                                                    |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | bodies                                                                                                                   |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | are                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | very                                                                                                                     |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | shallo                                                                                                                   |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | w                                                                                                                        |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | (e.g.                                                                                                                    |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | founta                                                                                                                   |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | ins).                                                                                                                    |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | -  This                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | value                                                                                                                    |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | must                                                                                                                     |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | not                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | exceed                                                                                                                   |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | **Stat                                                                                                                   |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | eLimit**                                                                                                                 |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | (colum                                                                                                                   |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | n                                                                                                                        |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | 8).                                                                                                                      |           |   |
+-----+-----+--------------+---------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------+---+
| 10  | MD  | DrainageE    | -999    | Drainage                                                                                                                 |           |   |
|     |     | q            |         | equation                                                                                                                 |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | to use                                                                                                                   |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | for this                                                                                                                 |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | surface.                                                                                                                 |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | -  Not                                                                                                                   |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | curren                                                                                                                   |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | tly                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | used                                                                                                                     |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | for                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | water                                                                                                                    |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | surfac                                                                                                                   |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | e.                                                                                                                       |           |   |

| 17  | MD  | OHMThresh    | 10      | Temperatu                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     | _SW          |         | re                                                                                                                       |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | threshold                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | determini                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | ng                                                                                                                       |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | whether                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | summer/wi                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | nter                                                                                                                     |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | OHM                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | coefficie                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | nts                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | are                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | applied                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | [deg C]                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | If 5-day                                                                                                                 |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | running                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | mean air                                                                                                                 |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | temperatu                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | re                                                                                                                       |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | is                                                                                                                       |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | greater                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | than or                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | equal to                                                                                                                 |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | this                                                                                                                     |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | threshold                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | ,                                                                                                                        |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | OHM                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | coefficie                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | nts                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | for                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | summertim                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | e                                                                                                                        |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | are                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | applied;                                                                                                                 |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | otherwise                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | coefficie                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | nts                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | for                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | wintertim                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | e                                                                                                                        |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | are                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | applied.                                                                                                                 |           |   |
+-----+-----+--------------+---------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------+---+
| 18  | MD  | OHMThresh_WD | 0.9     | Soil                                                                                                                     |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | moisture                                                                                                                 |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | threshold                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | determini                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | ng                                                                                                                       |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | whether                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | wet/dry                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | OHM                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | coefficie                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | nts                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | are                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | applied                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | [-] If                                                                                                                   |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | soil                                                                                                                     |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | moisture                                                                                                                 |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | (as a                                                                                                                    |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | proportio                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | n                                                                                                                        |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | of                                                                                                                       |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | maximum                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | soil                                                                                                                     |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | moisture                                                                                                                 |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | capacity)                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | exceeds                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | this                                                                                                                     |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | threshold                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | for bare                                                                                                                 |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | soil and                                                                                                                 |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | vegetated                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | surfaces,                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | OHM                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | coefficie                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | nts                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | for wet                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | condition                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | s                                                                                                                        |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | are                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | applied;                                                                                                                 |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | otherwise                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | coefficie                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | nts                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | for dry                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | coefficie                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | nts                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | are                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | applied.                                                                                                                 |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | Note that                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | OHM                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | coefficie                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | nts                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | for wet                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | condition                                                                                                                |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | s                                                                                                                        |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | are                                                                                                                      |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | applied                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | if the                                                                                                                   |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | surface                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | is wet.                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | **Not                                                                                                                    |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | actually                                                                                                                 |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | used for                                                                                                                 |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | water                                                                                                                    |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | surface                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | (as no                                                                                                                   |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | soil                                                                                                                     |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | surface                                                                                                                  |           |   |
|     |     |              |         | beneath).**                                                                                                              |           |   |
